response.overview: Fan passion project sequel to Jerry Seinfield's "Bee Movie".  Barry B. Benson discovers that Ken runs a drug empire where he sells honey meth. Upon learning this, Barry sets off to take down the empire so the bees' lives will no longer be ruined by drugs.
response.tagline: Barry B. Benson discovers that Ken runs a drug empire where he sells honey meth. Upon learning this, Barry sets off to take down the empire so the bees' lives will no longer be ruined by drugs.
response.title: The Three Movie
